Text: This is such a big fake! It contains some files that apears to be Tekla, but not all of them so you woulnt be able to unpack and run the installation. And the torrent also contains a couple of zipfiles of a program which is called "invoiceman" along with a keygen with a trojan (according to norton).  Total waste of of time and bandwith. As far as I know Tekla 17 licenceserver is not cracked yet. The uploader should check his stuff a bit better!
